# metadata

**Instance Property**

The metadata an export session writes to the output container file.

## Declaration

```swift
var metadata: [AVMetadataItem]? { get set }
```

## Configuring metadata

- **metadataItemFilter**: An object the export session uses to filter the metadata items it transfers to the output asset.

items.description: An object the export session uses to filter the metadata items it transfers to the output asset.
